title: Ishan kanakasabEshan
sahitya:
Ishan kanakasabEshan tillai vAsan tiru naTarAjan 
padam tuNaiyE kumarEshanin ishaittamizh


anupallavi

  tEjOmaya cinmaya cidvilAsan shilainudal 
umayavaL prANEshan shIraDiyArgaL nEshan


caraNam    anbilAda nIcan Am enaiyum vandANDu koNDaruLum sarvEshan inba sAgara 
kavi kunjaradAsan enadagha iruLalagavE varu bhAnukOTi ena oLi vIshu prakAshan nal
